content: join my facebook group for community coupons and cal challenges take me to the group 1 yarn lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton medium weight #4 yarn 100% mercerized cotton 186 yds/170 m per 3 5 oz/100 g skein ecru 3 skeins materials us g/6 4 00 mm hook scissors size & gauge 1 square = 14 x 14 finished tote = 20 across x 20 tall stitch key chain s = chain s double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch specialty stitch & technique key video 2 adjustable loop video 3 join as you go jaygo is worked by replacing a chain space with a slip_stitch into the connecting square notes tote created in 4 parts 3 joining squares border video 4 how to make a granny square april 2024 an additional version of the pattern instructions are now included featuring 1 an extended handle 2 condensed joining instructions 3 alternate joining assembly 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/ 2 https //youtu be/lzoe_2fdbnc 3 https //youtu be/4xjkkrgmb-i 4 https //youtu be/dq_kkg0zves
